label.val: Hide character names and horse names in screenshots
Hide character names and horse names
*Alt and Spacebar keys may not work when pressed at the same time as the arrow keys.
Listen to Alicia while the game is minimized
Makes the screen look a little brighter.
The faster you go, the more your peripheral vision blurs, giving you a better sense of speed.
*The game may slow down as more effects are enabled.
Use a high-resolution UI when the horizontal size is 1600 or larger
